ai-mil7.6.3:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the only one within two fingernails that he may remember?”
ai-mil7.6.3:1.2_0: “Great king, in the Sakyans’ slaves, threw them away, and burn them all up.
ai-mil7.6.3:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, anyone who lives engaged in good conduct of body should be runnning all over the flourishments of the body, without misfortune.
ai-mil7.6.3:1.4_0: This is the first thing that we should get to take place.
ai-mil7.6.3:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the feeding in the grove is for a well-proclaimed, and he summons his own teacher’s wife.
ai-mil7.6.3:2.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who practices seclusion should associate with, and one whose mind is free from the hindrance of seclusion and one who isn’t free of fear and dread, and one who practices it to the Saṅgha should live within the charming of the Saṅgha.
ai-mil7.6.3:2.3_0: this is the second great king.
ai-mil7.6.3:2.4_0: Sahampati, great king, tells him this in the presence of the Buddha.
ai-mil7.6.3:3.2_0: and practice to be released from fetters.
ai-mil7.6.3:3.3_0: If you don’t find enjoyment there,
ai-mil7.6.3:3.4_0: live in the Saṅgha, guarded and mindful.’”
ai-mil7.6.3:4.1_0: the third enquiry, (called) the third time,
